subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Former Georgetown Coach Craig Esherick may be best remembered for recruiting Jeff Green and Roy Hibbert. Just do not ask anyone in the program about Esherick’s role in getting them to campus.
snippet: Former Georgetown Coach Craig Esherick may be best remembered for recruiting Jeff Green and Roy Hibbert. Just do not ask anyone in the program about Esherick’s role in getting them to campus.
